articles.title: OpenAI and Google are all-in on AI assistants - The Verge
articles.description: Whether it’s ChatGPT-4o or Gemini, the biggest companies in tech all believe that the future is helpful, fun, maybe even flirty virtual assistants. On The Vergecast, we explain.
articles.content:
AI assistants are so back

articles.title: NASA's Juno Spacecraft Reveals Dynamic Shifts on Europa's Frozen Surface - SciTechDaily
articles.description: NASA’s Juno has provided images that support the theory of true polar wander on Europa, showing the moon’s ice shell has shifted. Images from the solar-powered spacecraft revealed intriguing features on the ice-encased Jovian moon, including geological disrup…
articles.content: Jupiter’s moon Europa was captured by the JunoCam instrument aboard NASA’s Juno spacecraft during the mission’s close flyby on September 29, 2022. The images show the fractures, ridges, and bands tha… [+7432 chars]
